<a id="class_AimModifier3D"></a>

# AimModifier3D

**Inherits:** [BoneConstraint3D](class_boneconstraint3d.md) **<** [SkeletonModifier3D](class_skeletonmodifier3d.md) **<** [Node3D](class_node3d.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

The **AimModifier3D** rotates a bone to look at a reference bone.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This is a simple version of [LookAtModifier3D](class_lookatmodifier3d.md) that only allows bone to the reference without advanced options such as angle limitation or time-based interpolation.

The feature is simplified, but instead it is implemented with smooth tracking without euler, see [set_use_euler()](class_aimmodifier3d.md#class_AimModifier3D_method_set_use_euler).

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_AimModifier3D_method_get_forward_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[BoneAxis](class_skeletonmodifier3d.md#enum_SkeletonModifier3D_BoneAxis) **get_forward_axis**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AimModifier3D_method_get_forward_axis)

Returns the forward axis of the bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AimModifier3D_method_get_primary_rotation_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Axis](class_vector3.md#enum_Vector3_Axis) **get_primary_rotation_axis**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AimModifier3D_method_get_primary_rotation_axis)

Returns the axis of the first rotation. It is enabled only if [is_using_euler()](class_aimmodifier3d.md#class_AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_using_euler**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler)

Returns ``true`` if it provides rotation with using euler.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AimModifier3D_method_is_using_secondary_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_using_secondary_rotation**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AimModifier3D_method_is_using_secondary_rotation)

Returns ``true`` if it provides rotation by two axes. It is enabled only if [is_using_euler()](class_aimmodifier3d.md#class_AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AimModifier3D_method_set_forward_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_forward_axis**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), axis\: [BoneAxis](class_skeletonmodifier3d.md#enum_SkeletonModifier3D_BoneAxis)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AimModifier3D_method_set_forward_axis)

Sets the forward axis of the bone.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AimModifier3D_method_set_primary_rotation_axis"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_primary_rotation_axis**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), axis\: [Axis](class_vector3.md#enum_Vector3_Axis)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AimModifier3D_method_set_primary_rotation_axis)

Sets the axis of the first rotation. It is enabled only if [is_using_euler()](class_aimmodifier3d.md#class_AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AimModifier3D_method_set_use_euler"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_use_euler**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AimModifier3D_method_set_use_euler)

If sets `enabled` to ``true``, it provides rotation with using euler.

If sets `enabled` to ``false``, it provides rotation with using rotation by arc generated from the forward axis vector and the vector toward the reference.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AimModifier3D_method_set_use_secondary_rotation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_use_secondary_rotation**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md), enabled\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AimModifier3D_method_set_use_secondary_rotation)

If sets `enabled` to ``true``, it provides rotation by two axes. It is enabled only if [is_using_euler()](class_aimmodifier3d.md#class_AimModifier3D_method_is_using_euler) is ``true``.
